ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Whats the arguement?
ygData.msgSnippet: sorry was just using you as an example of someone other than me who thinks bards are not underpowered in normal exp situations.  was directing these questions
ygData.messageBody:
sorry was just using you as an example of someone other than me who thinks
bards are not underpowered in normal exp situations. was directing these questions
to those who think the song should be pumped up so that more people would use it.

At 02:56 PM 3/1/01 -0500, you wrote:

> > shada i believe said we are already balanced or even
> > overpowered in the non uber raid
> > arena. how would this not make us overpowered or overpower
> > us even more in this
> > area? how would this even help us in the uber raid area
> > since most nonlure type
> > damage spells are heavily resisted anyway?
>
>i never mentioned this song had anything to do with balance, or that i
>wanted it to be helpful on an uber raid, just that i believe it is useless
>and i will never mem it.
>
>Shada
